sentences.en: All things are interrelated and interact on each other.
sentences.cn: 一切事物互相联系并相互作用.

sentences.en: Atoms within the fluid interact with the minerals that form the grains.
sentences.cn: 液体中的原子与形成颗粒的矿物质相互作用。

sentences.en: Business, like any other type of organized enterprise, must interact with, and live within, its environment.
sentences.cn: 公司象其他所有有组织的企业形式一样必须处在环境之中, 而且互相产生影响.

sentences.en: By such forces particles may interact with each other even when separated in empty space.
sentences.cn: 即使质点在空间相隔一定距离,由于这些力的缘故,它们之间仍有相互作用.

sentences.en: Did she interact with anyone here besides jos?
sentences.cn: 除了工作外她还和这里的什么人有关系 吗 ?

sentences.en: How would they address and interact with each other?
sentences.cn: 他们彼此怎么相互称呼,互相交流 呢 ?

sentences.en: It must not corrode metal fittings and interact with finish systems.
sentences.cn: 它必须不腐蚀金属装置,不和涂料系统发生互相作用.

sentences.en: The immune system interacts with both the nervous system and the hormones.
sentences.cn: 免疫系统与神经系统及激素相互影响。

sentences.en: The parts of the universe that can interact with the system are called the surroundings.
sentences.cn: 能和体系相互作用的各部分领域叫做环境.

sentences.en: The physics of surfaces is important because all substances interact with their surroundings through their surfaces.
sentences.cn: 表面物理学是很重要的,因为一切物质都要通过它们的表面同周围环境相互作用.

sentences.en: The policeman advised the criminal to interact with the police.
sentences.cn: 警察劝罪犯与警方合作.

sentences.en: These factors interact intimately and cannot be separated.
sentences.cn: 这些因素相互之间紧密联系,不能分开.

sentences.en: Wettability is the potential of a surface to interact with liquids wids specified characteristics.
sentences.cn: 润湿性则是固体表面同特定性能的液体,相互作用的势能.

sentences.en: Wettability is the potential of a surface to interact with liquids with specified characteristics.
sentences.cn: 润湿性则是表面同特定性能的液体,相互作用的势能.

sentences.en: While the other children interacted and played together, Ted ignored them.
sentences.cn: 当其他孩子们相互交往、一起玩耍时，泰德却不理他们。

sentences.en: You have to understand how cells interact.
sentences.cn: 你必须明白细胞是怎样相互作用的。

words.tran_cn: 相互作用；[数] 交互作用

trans.tran_en: if people interact with each other, they talk to each other, work together etc
if people interact with each other, they talk to each other, work together etc
